episodes.title: Blood Atonement : Ervil LeBaron
episodes.description: Season 23 : No Theme Cult leaders often use their position of power to take advantage of their followers. Usually so they'll give them money or engage in sexual activity with them. For Ervil LeBaron, he used his influence to get his followers to kill for him. subjects: Church of the First Born of the Lamb of God

episodes.title: The Cult of David : Immanuel David AKA Charles Longo
episodes.description: Season 22 : Family Annihilators Part 2 Charles Longo changed his name to Immanuel David and began telling people that he was God. He was so convincing that his own family would not only believe him, but would jump to their deaths after he died.
